mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.custom_name AS "customName", a.custom_code AS "customCode", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM archive_custom a
AND a.custom_code LIKE '%'||#{customCode}||'%' '%'+#{customCode}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{customCode}, '%')
AND a.custom_name LIKE '%'||#{customName}||'%' '%'+#{customName}+'%' CONCAT('%', #{customName}, '%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO archive_custom( custom_name, custom_code, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{customName}, #{customCode}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE archive_custom SET custom_name = #{customName}, custom_code = #{customCode}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
